title: 'Chuck it in the bag when you want to travel.'
body: 'Pros - Great Value for money at â‚¹1299. It does what it advertises. Charges an ipad and an iphone quick and together too if you can accept a slightly slower charge speed from the USB A port. The size is perfect and matches other single port chargers so for a dual port one its on the smaller side. Its perfect to chuck into a bag when you wanna travel.  Cons- The ridged design can attract dust and lint and the charger would\'ve been better without it. There\'s a tiny crackling ("trrrrrrrrr") sound you can hear when you plug it in which isn\'t the most assuring when you go to charge expensive devices Given that I haven\'t had any charge issues with it but a silent charge would\'ve gotten 5 stars because it wouldn\'t have put me in a dilemma of whether it was safe or not. It also does get slightly warm but I wouldn\'t consider it a proper con. when you push 35 watts through something this small its bound to get a little warm.  To summarise Its bang for buck if your buck is exactly â‚¹1299. Otherwise look elsewhere.'
